content.text:
# 20th Golden Globe Awards

The 20th Golden Globe Awards, honoring the best in film and television for 1962, were held on March 5, 1963.
Winners and nominees
won for To Kill a Mockingbird]]
won for Sweet Bird of Youth]]
won for Divorce, Italian Style]]
won for Gypsy ]]
won for Lawrence of Arabia]]
won for The Manchurian Candidate]]
